From: KSLawdogg@...

Stinkbomb/Ramhorn/Nemesis Enforcer:


::Stinkbomb and Ramhorn stopped, announcing the transformation code and going 
into their biped modes::

"Scanners detect a signature...but I can't get the name of the unit or what 
side it's on, must be an Alliance member." (Ramhorn said, pulling out his 
sub-machine gun that fires sonic shells, in turn Stinkbomb pulling out his 
tail gun, which is similar to a skunk's tail, although it's formed into a 
rifle that fires foul temporary paralyzing chemical spray, and raising his 
deadly seringed tail)

::Nemesis Enforcer dived down, raking his claws into the back of Ramhorn and 
Stinkbomb, lifting off into the air as the two Maximals hit the ground of the 
small clearing in a large forest they had stumbled into::
"Die!" ::Nemesis transformed to biped mode, landing on a tree branch ever so 
gently, firing a single missile from his missile launcher in between the 
unfortunate pair::
